channel.title: Adding more ports ( i want a null port and 2 playabul ports)
channel.description: hey i want to know how to make 3 ports one for only nulls ALL nulls and the 2 othere ones for players to play on with NOT EVEN ONE NULL

item.title: Adding more ports ( i want a null port and 2 playabul ports)
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“xXx JAVA OWNZ U xXx, post:20, topic:162519”] k your not an ass on this topic but i have one questiton lol how do i connect the char files[/quote]Select all your character files and right click then click copy, then go to the other server file then go in characters and right click in a space and right click and then click paste, wait, lemme get an example

Read full topic

item.title: Adding more ports ( i want a null port and 2 playabul ports)
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

dragonchain:

Wrong section and no need for this and no this does not work…

Lmao /fail. Wrong section?

Please be my guest to point him to the correct one.

dragonchain:

Well anyways the answer is, no you cannot do this.

Sorry /fail again.

The answer is, yes you can do this.

	public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594;

All you’d have to do is…

	public static int serverlistenerPort2 = 5555;

Then find…

clientListener = new java.net.ServerSocket(serverlistenerPort, 1, null);

Add

clientListener = new java.net.ServerSocket(serverlistenerPort2, 1, null);

Read full topic
